deePBABd.title: Effects of full water-soluble high-concentration NPK compound fertilizer Plant-prod on yield,quality of tomato and tested soil
deePBABd.abstract: The influences of Plant-prod fertilzer on yield,quality of tomato and soil were discribed.The results showed that the yield,single fruit weight,fruit diameter,soluble sugar,and vitamin C content of tomato were increased by 21.54%～29.61%,9.6%,12.6%,18.9% and 22.6%g respectively,meanwhile the organic acid content in fruit of tomato was decreased by 15.3% compared with the compound fertilizer for specific vegetables.The content of organic matter,available N,P_2O_5,K_2O in tested soil were increased by 6.9%,5.2%,9.9% and 24.0%.

t2Qy6NQn.title: Studying on chemical control technology of the weeds of the dry direct-seeded rice of single-middle-late season
t2Qy6NQn.abstract: In this paper the field experimentation was conducted during in 2012 in Huida Farm,Huizhou County,Guangdong Province.The main treatment is herbicide(Pretilachlor + Bensulfuron-methyl,Yangguo and Butachlor),the sub-treatment is application method(soil treatments,seedling treatment and integrated treatment).Results of investigation showed that under the soil moist conditions two methods can significantly controlled weed when were applied at 1 or 2 days after the seeding.one which 80 g of 36% Pretilachlor+4% Bensulfuron-methyl deluted to 50 kg of water was sprayed on the leaves of the weed per 667 m2;another which 200 g of 23.9% Butachlor +1.1% Bensulfuron-methyl mixed with 15 kg of sandy soil were applied on the pad per 667 m2.
keywords: chemical control technology of the weeds

D3LpoBe2.title: Comment on the Main Producing Factors of Sino-Russian Forestry
D3LpoBe2.abstract: According to the comparative profit theory and the factor theory,forestry capitalist factor,forestry technical factor and forestry working force factor will function on the districts with abundant forestry resources and forestry land during the process of Sino-Russian forestry economic and trade cooperation.All the above factors will arrange forestry resources and forestry land perfectly,making the unmovable forestry resources and forestry land produce huge profit.There are enough cooperating conditions for China and Russia in forestry resources,forestry working force and forestry technology.

9uG3kbI4.title: Clarify and Explian the Changes of Forest Area and Volume in Heilongjiang in Modern Times
9uG3kbI4.abstract: The forests in Heilongjiang province in the Qing Denesty, as a land directed from ancestors and for its special geopolitical relations, are best preserved, which have been called “Wo Collection”. In recent times, they have been deprived by Russian, Japanese imperialism, thus caused the decline of forest resources. The paper clarifies and explains the data about the forest area and the volume according the time sequence, and reveals the changes of forest resources in Heilongjiang Province.

rGTnsfsw.abstract: China furniture enterprises have been a considerable scale through a long period of development.Furniture industry at this stage is characterized by production capacity over the market.How to improve core productivity of furniture enterprises,select scientific target market and identify clients are the problems needed to be solved for furniture enterprises.In this paper,target market selection model and marketing strategy of furniture enterprises are put forward on the basis of market segmentation and evaluation according to different furniture enterprises characteristics in order to provide a theoretical reference for marketing decision-making of China furniture enterprises.

7SaToid7.abstract: Economical hotel management features on specialization and socialization.It takes room service as its core business,and other dining,washing as backup service.In order to enhance operation efficiency of economical should hotels,non-core businesses outsourcing need be adopted.By analyzing the objective and potential risks of economic hotel outsourcing,this paper proposes management policy that economical hotel make clear the conditions of implementing outsourcing,scientifically reasonably select professional outsourcing company,sign consummation outsourcing contract,define the responsibilities,powers and interests of both sides involved.

TJaQ20Gr.abstract: Ecosystem tour plays an import role in the sustainable development of nature reserves, yet may arouse many contradictions . In order to resolve contradictions between conservation and development and improve the sustainable development of the ecosystem tour in nature reserves, SWOT analysis was used to analyze systematically advantages and disadvantages, opportunities and threats in the ecosystem tour in nature reserves China and the related strategies were discussed.

VPdj4M3c.title: Government and Planting Industry Insurance of Commercial Insurance Company——Gaming of cost cooperation and performance analysis
VPdj4M3c.abstract: China as a big agricultural country with vast territory suffers serious national disasters.Since 1982 the year of resuming agricultural insurance,she has long been exploring her own way,which draws great attention from all fields of society.Insurance and management of planting industries covers three behavioral agents,government,commercial insurance company and farmer.Government,to certain extent,can be regarded as an interest body,that is,government and commercial insurance company all pursue their profit maximum in insurance and management.Through building a gaming model of these bodies,we undertake to analyze the cost of government and commercial insurance company during insurance and management for planting industry,as well as their predicted performance,and try to analyze their rationality between cost input and effectiveness distribution.

EbJ0E8zI.title: The Public Analysis about the Functions of Nature Reserves
EbJ0E8zI.abstract: The author analyzes the public character of function of nature protection area (NPA) on the basis of concluding the NPA functions as natural monopoly on public goods,public resource and private goods and product.The analysis aims to provide a economics standpoint for NPA's value evaluation and management patterns.Because of NPA's economic externality,hitchhiking phenomenon,market malfunction and government malfunction,it is a necessity for the diversification of NPA managemential entities,which include government,private sector,community,the third party organization and other non-governmental organizations.This may benefit sustainable development of NPA and harmonious development of human and nature.

gByWdgTd.title: Attaching More Importance to the Protection of Ecological Environment in Management Innovation
gByWdgTd.abstract: With the situation of the shortage of the ecological products,realizing the harmonious development between human beings and nature not only is a problem relating to technology,but also needs reforming and renovating of every aspect.The purpose of the reform and renovation is to build up and improve a new system,develop green economy,recycling economy,thus establishing an economical and environment-friendly society,which are the significant requirements by the conception of scientific development to the management of the social economical life.Protecting ecological environment needs to put forward a serial of policies and measures of micro and macro management,and strengthening the supervision of carrying them out.By the establishment and renovation of management system,an effective and scientific management system and regulation is set up,which is a very necessary and complicated job.

F4K7fGjC.title: Studies on the Mode of Social Securities for China’s Natural Forest Protection Areas
F4K7fGjC.abstract: The paper reviews the changes of nature reserve community dwellers' social welfare resulting from the Natural Forest Protection Program in China. The paper holds that the social security mode designed for the people living in the natural forest program areas, with new objectives, fund entity and operation system, should be established to adapt to local economic development and local dwellers’financial availability. The model is used to expand the coverage of social security and the smooth completion of the natural forest protection project. And it provides a development ideas for the final realization of the overall planning for urban and rural social security system.

jroLagtK.abstract: Leisure industry is the leading industry of developed countries which takes the tourism,the entertainment industry,service industry,the sports industry and the cultural industry as the main item economic ideology and the industrial system.In recent years leisure industry has also obtained the quick development in our country.The article analyzes the social function of leisure industry and points out that leisure industry plays an indispensable part in making people satisfied with their enjoyment which can also help to realize the recreation of productive forces,to raise the quality of living conditions,promote the economic and social progress as well as the cultural inheritance.

Iez4UVLo.title: Research on the Safety Problems of Ski Resorts
Iez4UVLo.abstract: The ski resorts are where people get ski products and service.More and more skiers pay attention to the safety precautions of ski resorts.It's the all-important problem for these resorts to furthest protect skiers against hurts during skiing.With the method combining documentary analysis and actual investigation,the article has a tracking illustration of hurts during skiing in ski resorts and classifies the types and causations of hurts during skiing on the basis of investigation.For reducing and preventing the hurts during skiing,it suggests some safety precautions:advance the scientific programming of ski resorts,strengthen the running maintain of equipment,make the standardization using ski gears and safety precautions with some idea of safety management in ski resorts.

hw7571Lc.title: Reseach of the Present Situation and Countermeasures of Key State-owned Factories of Forest Industry in Heilongjiang Province
hw7571Lc.abstract: Analysed the present situation of key factories of forest industry,and it divided the factories into six types:the type of exist in name only;type of nature depletion;type of guard;type of difficult management;type of scattered development and type of little profit.Analysed the reasons and put forward eight kinds of countermeasures:making the better factries stronger;concentrating the resource to conformity some factories;combining some factories in the same region;the state-owned capital withdraw some middle-small business;seperating the auxiliary body from main body;vitalizing part of the factry;the management department purchasing some factories and bankruptcy.

S09w5N9M.abstract: The equipment cooling heat exchanger is an important equipment of safety system in nuclear power plant.The operation of nuclear power plant is directly influenced by equipment cooling heat exchanger service condition.Static analysis under dead weight,pressure load and nozzle load,modal analysis and spectrum analysis under seismic loads were performed.The results demonstrate that the stress combination and evaluation under each service level satisfy the requirement of ASME BPVC-III codes.

Di3gGjbq.title: Temperature Analysis Study on Core Shroud Based on Thermal-Fluid-Structure Coupling Effect
Di3gGjbq.abstract: In this paper,3-D FEM core shroud and core barrel are modeled based on thermal-fluidstructure coupling effect.The temperature analysis method are studied with 3-D thermal solid element,3-D thermal surface effect element and 3-D coupled thermal-fluid pipe element,which is expected to be useful for key technique study on reactor internals.

UxAe1oNC.title: Comparison and validation of dynamic characteristic analytical method for tubular heat exchanger
UxAe1oNC.abstract: In this study, the natural frequencies of Normal Residual Heat Removal Heat Exchangers are evaluated based on the beam and shell-beam finite element models. The corresponding results are compared and some discrepancies are observed. These discrepancies are analyzed in terms of the analysis of a cylindrical shell and the unreasonable treatment of boundary conditions is accordingly pointed out. The experimental data of the natural frequencies of heat exchangers used for Qishan Phase I Nuclear Power Plant are compared with the computational results from the shell-beam models for corresponding heat exchangers of C-2 program. The experimental and numerical results agree quite well, which implies that the shell-beam finite element simplification is applicable to the heat exchangers. The results indicate that the procedures introduced in this article apply to the dynamic analysis of other similar heat exchangers.

HtgAJRrp.title: Flaws Analysis and Safety Evaluation of Dissimilar Metal Weld Joints
HtgAJRrp.abstract: Flaws detected in in-service inspection of dissimilar metal weld joints were evaluated in this paper according to Appendix C and Appendix H of ASME BPVC Section Ⅺ.In the flaw safety evaluation,a method using a surface flaw evaluation diagram based on Appendix C was introduced and applied.This allows the evaluation of any surface indication at dissimilar metal weld joints,without additional knowledge of fracture mechanics required.

PAzcx4vk.title: Load Analysis and Stress Evaluation for Irradiation Surveillance Capsules and Supporting Structures in C-1 Modified Project
PAzcx4vk.abstract: Some irradiation surveillance capsules(ISCs) welded assemblies and supporting structures were found to be worn seriously between the alignment keys of ISCs and the slots of the hangers.Modified ISCs and supporting structures were designed,and it is necessary to perform load analysis and stress evaluation for their integrity throughout the remained service life of the plant.Loads applying to the structures were analyzed.Then,stress and fatigue analysis were carried.According to ASME codes,stress evaluations under various service limits were performed.

UatPVUto.title: Dissection of Ability Reduced Factors in Shell Buckling Analysis
UatPVUto.abstract: The linear and nonlinear buckling analyses are usually performed to calculate the buckling loads of shells in engineering.For complicated structures,steel containment vessel for instance,if the method of nonlinear buckling analysis were directly applied,the calculated workload would be very big and it would not be easy to obtain the required critical load.Therefore,the linear elastic method is often used in calculating the critical buckling load,then the engineering handling will be done subsequently to obtain the required critical buckling loads.Firstly,the linear elastic theory is introduced.Secondly,the buckling load of a cylindrical shell under both axial compression and external pressure is obtained using ANSYS software,and compared with the theoretical solution.Finally,the meaning and rationality of the "ability reduced factors" are anatomized according to difference between previous experimental results and top critical values obtained by the linear elastic theory.The result indicates that the linear elastic method is feasible for buckling solution,when the "ability reduced factors","safety factor" and "plasticity reduction factor" are considered,which can obtain the required buckling values in engineering.

UJYjBzx9.title: Anti-seismic analysis and evaluation for packing device in ultimate heat sink cooling tower of nuclear power plant
UJYjBzx9.abstract: To evaluate the anti-seismic performance of the packing device in ultimate heat sink cooling tower of nuclear power plant,the packing device model is simplified reasonably,the computation model is established using finite element method,the load combinations under various working condition are calculated,the static analysis under deadweight load and the dynamic response analysis under seismic loads are carried out,and the calculation results are evaluated according to the ASME standard.The results show that the design of the packing device meets the anti-seismic requirement of the nuclear power plant.

o1QAtLtq.title: Sealing Characteristic Analysis for Unusual Sealing Structure
o1QAtLtq.abstract: The sealing characteristic of an unusual sealing structure was analyzed with MSC.Marc software.Characteristics of the structure were caught on.The analysis results are available to be the boundary conditions for the subsequent stress analysis and fatigue analysis without the cost of test or practical operation.

8Q5WeQJm.title: Study on computational method of allowable nozzle loads for nuclear vessels
8Q5WeQJm.abstract: The vessel-based method, with respect of the piping-based method, is one of the two methods generally used to obtain the nozzle loads for nuclear vessels. This paper studies the calculation and evaluation criteria of allowable nozzle loads for nuclear vessels of nuclear safety class 1 with this method. An example of a specific vessel has provided.

bb2z0A0S.title: The Research of the Calculation of Membrane Plus Bending Stress for Perforated Plates
bb2z0A0S.abstract: It established two FEM models which are a 3D solid element model and a 2D equivalent solid axisymmetric model,respectively,for the equivalent of the perforated plates of the square penetration pattern.And the maximum membrane plus bending stresses of these two models are calculated by direct FEM calculation and by usage of ASME code which are used for triangle pattern respectively.The comparison of the results shows that the results solved by ASME rules are conservative,and the ASME rules are applicable for perforated plate of square penetration pattern perforated plate.The results provide supporting evidence for the feasibility of ASME evaluation with equivalent models of the perforated plate of the square penetration pattern perforated plate.

9cIsJGnD.title: Fracture Mechanics Analysis for Reactor Pressure Vessel under Overcooling Transient
9cIsJGnD.abstract: The fracture mechanics analysis for different flaw is illustrated using MSC Marc. During the typical overcooling transients (LBLOCA and SBLOCA) for RPV in service, comparison is made to probe what kind of flaw and what kind of transient are most dangerous. The influence of the cladding on the fracture analysis is investigated. The fracture analysis results between finite element method and theoretic method have a good agreement.

ryC2BLcg.title: Stress Analysis and Evaluation of Pressure Vessel in Nuclear Power Plant based on Response Spectrum Method
ryC2BLcg.abstract: The mechanics analysis for nuclear pressure vessel is an important part of analysis method design in nuclear power plant.The operation of emergency diesel building is directly influenced by working condition of pressure air bottle,which works as a crucial equipment in nuclear power plant.The static analysis under dead weight,design pressure and setting pressure,buckling analysis,modal analysis and response spectrum analysis under seismic loads were performed.The results demonstrate that the stress combination and evaluation under each service level is satisfied for the requirement of ASME codes.

8QOUQXF8.title: Research on the Analysis of Seismic Response of Boron Condensate Cooler
8QOUQXF8.abstract: Builds a computational model for boron condensate cooler by using the finite element method.And carries out the static analysis under deadweight,pressure and nozzle loads,modal analyses,and spectrum analysis under seismic loads.Obtains the stress of boron condensate cooler,and makes assessment on the load combinations and stress of boron condensate cooler under each using limit condition.The evaluation result demonstrates that the various components of boron condensate cooler can meet the requirement of the ASME Section III-ND & NF codes.

QtjGv6gU.title: The Discourse Style and the Influence of Literary and Art Criticism in the Era of Maoist Style of Writing
QtjGv6gU.abstract: Under the dual influence of polarized thinking and war culture,the literature and art criticism in the era of Maoist style of writing develops a discourse style with outstanding characteristics of the era,including the subject of discourse with an unswerving belief in truth,eloquent and compelling argumentation with precise,resolute diction.The Maoist-style of writing,as the discourse system with the supreme power in a particular era,did not come to an end when the era of Maoist style of writing ended.Instead,the Maoist-style of writing still has profound impact on contemporary literature and art criticism in terms of discourse and practice.

bcTxltcg.title: Raymond Williams and the Birth of "Keywords Criticism"
bcTxltcg.abstract: Initiated in 1950-70s,"criticism",with core terms as its research center,teases from diachronic and synchronic levels and reveals behind the words the orientation of political thoughts and traces of humanity,which bears originality in research perspective and wideness in theoretical horizon.Keywords:Vocabulary of Culture and Society(1976) by Raymond Williams is a sign of the rise of "keywords criticism".Raymond Williams views words as "condescension of social practice" and "container of political strategies",and attaches importance to digging into the cultural and political connotations in the practical application of language and variations of meanings.This paper,from different levels such as theoretical sources,realistic foundation and political standpoint,conducts a study of the initiation of "keywords criticism",and then probes into Raymond Williams' significant contribution to the formation of theoretical peculiarity and textual styles of "keywords criticism".

authors.name: Huang Qing
authors.org: Hangzhou ,China

BZpk8w70.title: Perspective on the  Study of Essentiality of  Literary Ideology
BZpk8w70.abstract: In the early years of the New Period, along with the constant improvement of the social and political environment, the contestations among the exponents in the academic circles became lively; the viewpoint that (″literature) is a special ideology″ was also hotly debated. In the beginning of 1988, Luan Changda and Dong Xuewen began to query about the essentiality of ideology, and brought a severe concussion to the concept of essentiality of literary ideology which was considered as the standard till that time, that triggered the contestation concerning the relationship between ideology and literature among the academic circles, which lasted for several years. The question whether the literature's true nature consists in ideology became the core proposition of the contestation. The essentiality of ideology recovered its predominant position in the contestation, and the scholars had sufficient and fruitful discussions on the definition of the basic concept of the ideology, the relationship between the literature and ideology, the dialectical relationship between the essentiality of literary ideology and the non-literary ideology, and the aesthetical ideology of literature etc. The fundamental premise of the deep probing into in the literary ideology is to understand correctly the original idea of the classic writers of Marxism and to clarify the ideology and its related concepts. As Lu Meilin said that too narrow or too broad interpretation of the connotation of the ideology is one of the main reasons that caused the disorder in the field of literature theories, and he pointed out that ideology is a concept about the whole organism of composing factors. Many scholars, such as Zhang Shouying, Bian Pingshu, and Li Sixiao, are interested in the composing factors of ideology. While they focused on the analysis of the concept of ideology, scholars like Feng Yi and Huang Lizhi adhered to the essentiality of ideology and launched the in-depth discussion on the relationship between the main role of literature and the nature of ideology. In the 1980s, scholars including Qian Zhongwen, Tong Qingbing and Wang Yuanxiang, deliberated on the aesthetical ideology and the aesthetical theory of reflection.   In the field of the aesthetical ideology, they made a systematic and in-depth investigation on the nature of literature, successfully resolved the conflict between the literary ideology and the aesthetical consciousness, and opened a new window for us to understand the correlative contradictions between the form and the contents, the emotion and the reason, expression and representation, humanity and the class nature. Although there is a limitation in its failure to explain efficiently how to achieve the harmony between aesthetical consciousness and the ideological factors of literature, the aesthetical ideology transcended the bondage of pure epistemology, and fitted a dialectical link between the literary ideology and the aesthetical factors, and in this way enriched and developed the Marxist viewpoint on the nature of literature. In conclusion, when we affirm that the innate nature of literature consists in the ideology, we must know that literature also contains some non-ideological factors, and in order to prevent the tendency of simplicity and philistinism in the field of literary studies and to cognize the scientific literary phenomena, it is very important to penetrate into these non-ideological factors.

W5kaBl3o.title: Comments on the Phenomenon of Collective Composition during 1949-1976
W5kaBl3o.abstract: As the regular expression and key components of national power discourse,the collective composition during 1949-1976 has been endowed with strong tint of political power,with "three combinations" working as its symbol which gradually rose into dominant mode of literary production.The essence of the change in the composition style is employing national regime power to restrain and stipulate composition from high to low social ranks,i.e.concerning the issues about who composes,for whom they compose,what they compose and how to compose.Dominant and recessive collective composition quietly interflowed,both dip-dyed with ictus of contemporary political discourse,disregarding and ignoring fresh individual thinking of discourse subject,and under the banner of "serving the workers,peasants and soldiers",cultural traditions of intellectuals and folk cultural traditions continuously being rebuilt and utilized by mainstream political ideology.

DAALNuyz.title: Reflections on ″Keyword Criticism″ in Literary Research
DAALNuyz.abstract: ″Key words:criticism″,put forward by Raymond Williams,opens a new window,which reflects the disciplinary development via the explanation of core terms.It also provides a brand new research paradigm,which enlightens the increasingly stylized and prejudiced literary research in terms of methodology.Since the 1990s,there has been a noticeable phenomenon of keywords in the field of literary criticism.The ″keyword criticism″ has many new changes and advances at the level of critical practices.For instance,instead of focusing on the etymological review,the current ″keyword criticism″ examines the derivation of keywords in the critical practices,aiming at the construction and development of literary criticism theory and relevant subjects.It embodies the tendency to emphasize the close connection between the critical practices and the corresponding literary text.Some breakthroughs are made in the system of compilation and the literariness is signified further.All these reveal a new direction for the development of the ″keyword criticism″,and also show its vitality and achievements in the context of the new era.While fully understanding the theoretical value of the ″keyword criticism″,we should pay attention to some theory traps and practice paradoxes to avoid the transformation of political perspective,i.e.from the original one-dimensional view to the only angle perspective.We should beware of keywords' hegemony and superficialness as well.

pehIOpAJ.title: The "Key words Writing" in the Research of Contemporary Literature
pehIOpAJ.abstract: "Keywords writing",a literary phenomenon that appeared under the influence of "Keywords Criticism",has attracted remarkable attention in the field of contemporary literature in China.It manifests an awareness of discipline reflection and discipline construction,and carries on researches which lay stress on the close relationship between the creative subject and his literary works,thus promoting the development of contemporary literature.Bearing the"shortcomings"of"Keywords Criticism"in mind,we must avoid its tendency of hegemony,and of superficial and over-simplified interpretation,and practice question-oriented researches.Only by doing this,can we innovate and apply "keywords criticism"properly,and promote a healthy development of contemporary literature research in our country.

aPcxRZF8.title: Rebellion and subversion: views on Catch22 at the Angle of Irony
aPcxRZF8.abstract: Irony, as an important feature of Catch22, is the focus of this paper. Joseph Heller reveals the true reality full of conflicts through fantastic situation (the situational irony) and bantering narrative (the narrative irony). He ponders deeply over the philosophical significance in rebelling against the variable, preposterous and absurd postwar society as well as the embarrassing circumstances of life.

0Ib33kzJ.title: Reflection on the Human Science in the Constitute of Technique and Time
0Ib33kzJ.abstract: Technique and Time: The fault of Epimetheus by Bernard Stiegler,probes into the position and function of technique and time in humanity,then establish a kind of new relations among technique,time and humanity.He regards that the intrinsic instrument character of technique embodies the "prothèse" of human being's nature.Human being's nature,which appendages to technique,is time.We should establish human being's essence on the technique(instrument).Although radical and lopsided,yet it renders technique's position in philosophy anew.Bernard Stiegler proposes that we stipulate human being's essence as technique,and grasp the transformation of human beings during the change of technique.Undoubtedly,this new topic is of great significance to us for the reflection upon the humanist view of the Marxist philosophy.

7NnYXau7.title: Clinical analysis of two CADASIL families
7NnYXau7.abstract: 【Objectives】Clinical data of two CADASIL families were analysed in order to improve the awareness of the disease.【Methods】CADASIL was diagnosed by investigation of ultra-structure changes of arteriole in skin and NOTCH3 gene mutation in the two index cases.The clinical data of these two cases and their family members were collected,and the clinicalpathology and imaging manifestation were analyzed on the bases of the literature that had been reported.【Results】None of our patients showed migraine.The recurrent ischemic manifestation of verte-bral basilar artery system such as episodic vertigo and tinnitus were common in early stage of the patients.Two symptomatic patients and one asymptomatic patient have not been found any MRI changes,but detected Granular osminophilic material(GOM) deposited on the skin biopsy by electron microscope examination.【Conclusions】Mi-graine was not the typical presentation in our population.The positive GOM of biopsy in skin are clinical signifi-cance in the early diagnosis of CADASIL,gene mutation can confirm the diagnosis.

C5AVkPRj.title: Evaluation of diagnostic skin biopsy in cerebral autosomal dominant arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy
C5AVkPRj.abstract: Objective To study the value of skin biopsy in the diagnosis of cerebral autosomal dominant arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy (CADASIL).Methods Twelve patients from 4 different CADASIL families who had the main manifestations including dizziness,headache,recurrent stroke and dementia. The genetic examinations showed Notch3 gene mutations in all of the patients. Skin biopsies were performed in the 12 patients. Sixteen non-CADASIL patients at the same age severed as the controls. The sensitivity and specificity of ultrastructural GOM deposite and NOTCH3 N-terminal polyclonal antibody for the diagnosis of CADASIL were evaluated.Results The sensibility of ultrastructural GOM deposite in the 12 patients was 58.3% and the specificity was 93.8%. The sensibility of NOTCH3 N-terminal polyclonal antibody was 66.6% and the specificity was 96.9%. With a combination of the two methods,the sensibility and the specificity for the diagnosis of CADASIL were 91.7% and 95.4%,respectively.Conclusions A combination of ultrastructural GOM examination with NOTCH3 N-terminal polyclonal antibody can improve the diagnostic efficiency of CADASIL.
keywords: cerebral autosomal dominant arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy

vaHOwnLp.title: The Expression Development of Proapoptic Molecule C/EBP Homology Protein mRNA and Protein Following Focal Cerebral Ischemia/Reperfusion in Rats
vaHOwnLp.abstract: Aim To detect the expression development of proapoptic molecule C/EBP homology protein(CHOP)mRNA and protein,and explore its effect on neuronal apoptosis after cerebral ischemia/reperfusion in rats.Methods Transient focal cerebral ischemia was induced by middle cerebral artery occlusion(MCAO)for 2 hours followed by reperfusion in sprague-dawley rats.Then,the expression of CHOP protein and/or mRNA were measured with methods of immunohistochemistry and reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction(RT-PCR)at 1 h,3 h,6 h,12 h and 24 h after reperfusion in cerebral cortex of rats.The neuronal apoptosis was detected by the method of terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase-mediated dUTP-biotin nick end labeling(TUNEL).Results In cerebral ischemia model group,the expression level of CHOP mRNA reached a peak at 12 h after reperfusion and that of CHOP protein reached a peak at 24 h after reperfusion,which paralleled with the tendency of neuronal apoptosis development.Conclusion Cerebral ischemia reperfusion may induce CHOP expression.CHOP may play an important role in neuronal apoptosis induced by cerebral ischemia/reperfusion.

n0Bh779s.title: Absence of association between atherosclerotic cerebral infarction and TNFSF4/TNFRSF4 single nucleotide polymorphisms rs1234313, rs1234314 and rs17568 in a Chinese population.
n0Bh779s.abstract: To clarify the association between atherosclerotic cerebral infarction (ACI) and the single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNP) rs1234313 and rs1234314 (in TNFSF4) and rs17568 (in TNFRSF4).Genomic DNA was extracted from peripheral blood of patients with ACI and healthy control subjects. The presence of carotid plaque was determined. Rs1234313, rs1234314 and rs17568 were characterized via SNP genotyping assay and verified by DNA sequencing.Genotype distributions were in Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium. There were no significant differences in the allele and genotype distributions of rs1234313, rs1234314 and rs17568 between patients with ACI (n = 450) and healthy control subjects (n = 378), or between patients with ACI and carotid plaque (n = 342) and controls.There were no significant associations between rs1234313, rs1234314 and rs17568 and ACI risk in a Han Chinese population.

hWpgNjEF.title: The relationship of P47~(phox) C923T (Ala308Val)polymorphism to cerebral infarction and its effect on plasma lipid levels
hWpgNjEF.abstract: Objective To investigate the relationship between C923T(Ala308Val)polymorphism in the exonl0 of P47~(phox)gene and cerebral infarction and to evaluate the effect of C923T polymorphism on plasma lipid levels.Methods Peripheral blood samples were collected from 110 patients with cerebral infarction,100 sex and age-matched healthy controls,and 102 members of 10 cerebral infarction pedigrees 19 of which were cerebral infarction patients.The polymorphism in P47~(phox)gene was determined by PCR- single strand conformation polymorphism analysis and DNA sequencing.Plasma lipid levels were measured by routine methods.Results Three gene types,CC,CT,and TF were found in the C923T(Ala308Val) polymorphism site.No statistically significant differences were found in the frequencies of genotypes and alleles of C923T polymorphism between the controls and cerebral infarction patients(all P>0.05).The serum levels of triglyceride of cerebral infarction patients and controls with the CT genotype were markedly higher than those of the cerebral infarction patients and controls with the CC genotype(both P<0.05). Conclusion There is no association between the C923T polymorphism and cerebral infarction. C923Tpolymorphism is associated with plasma lipid metabolism.

CixUmaNx.title: Roles of HAP1 in the Endocytosis of pro-BDNF
CixUmaNx.abstract: Objective:To investigate the roles of HAP1 in endocytosis of pro-BDNF and the underlying mechanism. Methods: PC12 cells were differentiated by NGF and co-transfected with plasmid of HAP1A-CFP and (or) pro-BDNF-ds-red. Then the cells were incubated with either recombinant ds-red-labeled pro-BDNF,or in combination with sheep anti-BDNF antibodies,rabbit anti-p75NTR,or sheep anti-sortilin antibodies. The expression of fluorescence and its intercellular location were determined by laser scanning confocal microscope. Cortical neurons from HAP1+/+ and HAP1-/- mice at postnatal day 1 were cultured and treated with biotin labeled pro-BDNF to trigger endocytosis. After 60 min,the cells were washed and fixed,followed by immunostaining and confocal imaging. Results: Co-transfected PC12 cells or cells transfected with HAP1A-CFP which were incubated with recombinant ds-red-labeled pro-BDNF showed almost complete co-localization of HAP1 with pro-BDNF. The antibodies to BDNF,p75NTR,and sortilin abolished co-localization of HAP1 with pro-BDNF. In addition,the labeled pro-BDNF was detected in almost all HAP1+/+,but not in HAP1-/- cortical neurons. Conclusion: HAP1 plays an important role in the endocytosis of pro-BDNF.

sK17RrZH.title: The study on the association between the SNP rs3850641 of TNFSF4 gene and cerebral infarction
sK17RrZH.abstract: Objective To investigate the associations of TNFSF4 gene polymorphisms rs3850641 and cerebral infarction in Hunan population.Methods The frequencies of the genotypes of rs3850641 were detected by utilizing real-time fluorescent PCR method based on TaqMan probe.Objects examined were composed of 284 patients and 309 healthy individuals.Result There was no significant difference in genotypes(χ2=3.551,P=0.169)and allele frequency(χ2=3.261,P=0.071)of TNFSF4 gene rs3850641 between the cerebral infarction group and the control group(P>0.05).There was no significant difference in genotypes and allele frequency of rs3850641 between the cerebral infarction subgroups and the control group(P>0.05).The distribution of G allele frequency was significantly lower in patient group than in control(χ2=5.993,P<0.05).Logistic regression analysis showed that the GG genotype may not increase the risk of cerebral infarction in Hunan population.Conclusions TNFSF4 gene SNP rs3850641 may not associated with cerebral infarction in Hunan Han population.

fgVAyBTL.title: Expression of P-selectin in cerebrovascular endothelial cells of rats with diabetes
fgVAyBTL.abstract: Objective To explore the mechanisms of cerebral microvascular disorders in rats with diabetes.Methods Diabetes was induced by injecting 1% streptozocin (STZ). Twenty-four Sprague-Dawley rats were randomly assigned into three groups: control group normal rats, DM8 group with an 8-weeks course of diabetes and DM24 group with 24-weeks course of diabetes (n=8 each). The expression of P-selectin (Ps) in cerebral microvascular and plasm C-reactive protein (CRP) were detected.Results Ps was not expressed in the control group. Ps positive endothelial cells were mostly expressed in microvessels with a diameter of 7.5-30 μm in rats with diabetes. The expression of Ps was significant of higher in the two DM groups than that in the control group (P<0.01). There were significant differences in the Ps expression between the DM24 and DM8 groups (P<0.05). Plasm CRP concentration increased in the DM8 and DM24 groups compared with that in the control group (P<0.01). A significant difference was also observed in the CRP concentration between the DM8 and DM24 groups (P<0.005).Conclusions The increased expression of Ps in cerebral microvascular may be related to chronic low grade inflamemation, which may be one of the mechanisms of cerebral microvascular disorders in diabetes rats.

6GtDc4zg.title: The relationship of P47phox C923T (Ala308Val) polymorphism to cerebral infarction and its effect on plasma lipid levels]
6GtDc4zg.abstract: To investigate the relationship between C923T (Ala308Val) polymorphism in the exon10 of P47(phox) gene and cerebral infarction and to evaluate the effect of C923T polymorphism on plasma lipid levels.Peripheral blood samples were collected from 110 patients with cerebral infarction, 100 sex and age-matched healthy controls, and 102 members of 10 cerebral infarction pedigrees 19 of which were cerebral infarction patients. The polymorphism in P47(phox) gene was determined by PCR-single strand conformation polymorphism analysis and DNA sequencing. Plasma lipid levels were measured by routine methods.Three gene types, CC, CT, and TT were found in the C923T (Ala308Val) polymorphism site. No statistically significant differences were found in the frequencies of genotypes and alleles of C923T polymorphism between the controls and cerebral infarction patients (all P > 0.05). The serum levels of triglyceride of cerebral infarction patients and controls with the CT genotype were markedly higher than those of the cerebral infarction patients and controls with the CC genotype (both P < 0.05).There is no association between the C923T polymorphism and cerebral infarction. C923Tpolymorphism is associated with plasma lipid metabolism.

z9Fj5yp4.title: Curcumin protects neurons against oxygen-glucose deprivation/reoxygenation-induced injury through activation of peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor-γ function.
z9Fj5yp4.abstract: The turmeric derivative curcumin protects against cerebral ischemic injury. We previously demonstrated that curcumin activates peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor-γ (PPARγ), a ligand-activated transcription factor involved in both neuroprotective and anti-inflammatory signaling pathways. This study tested whether the neuroprotective effects of curcumin against oxygen-glucose deprivation/reoxygenation (OGD/R)-induced injury of rat cortical neurons are mediated (at least in part) by PPARγ. Curcumin (10 μM) potently enhanced PPARγ expression and transcriptional activity following OGD/R. In addition, curcumin markedly increased neuronal viability, as evidenced by decreased lactate dehydrogenase release and reduced nitric oxide production, caspase-3 activity, and apoptosis. These protective effects were suppressed by coadministration of the PPARγ antagonist 2-chloro-5-nitrobenzanilide (GW9662) and by prior transfection of a small-interfering RNA (siRNA) targeting PPARγ, treatments that had no toxic effects on healthy neurons. Curcumin reduced OGD/R-induced accumulation of reactive oxygen species and inhibited the mitochondrial apoptosis pathway, as indicated by reduced release of cytochrome c and apoptosis-inducing factor and maintenance of both the mitochondrial membrane potential and the Bax/Bcl-2 ratio. Again, GW9662 or PPARγ siRNA transfection mitigated the protective effects of curcumin on mitochondrial function. Curcumin suppressed IκB kinase phosphorylation and IκB degradation, thereby inhibiting nuclear factor-κ B (NF-κB) nuclear translocation, effects also blocked by GW9662 or PPARγ siRNA. Immunoprecipitation experiments revealed that PPARγ interacted with NF-κB p65 and inhibited NF-κB activation. The present study provides strong evidence that at least some of the neuroprotective effects of curcumin against OGD/R are mediated by PPARγ activation.

9VNANtin.title: Reflections on Undergraduate Education Evaluation
9VNANtin.abstract: Undergraduate education evaluation for those universities which are initially evaluated can transform government functions and strengthen the macro-management so as to provide university leaders and educational administrators with basis for scientific decision.In addition,the evaluation can appraise and diagnose the undergraduate education to make its management standard and scientific.For those universities which take part for the second time or in the cycle of every five years,the evaluation mainly functions as inspection as well as investigating and affixing responsibility.It is required by the evaluation that any university,at least those involved in "211 Projects",should have their own distinctive features.The system of evaluation index should be improved in the following aspects: more attention should be paid to differences among universities;qualitative and quantitative evaluation should be combined;the relationship between teaching and scientific research should be inspected;and logical relations among indexes should be appropriate.The result of evaluation should be consistent with financial allocation to the university,with examination and approval of enrollment plan and with the offering of specialties.

JkOopuLY.title: The Empirical Study of Private Investment in Infrastructure for Economic Growth
JkOopuLY.abstract: Based on the economic growth and private investment data of Henan Province,the paper establishes an econometric model of empirical research and uses cointegration theory to research private investment impact on economic growth in infrastructure.Statistical results showed that there exits long-term,stable and balanced cointegration relationship between the private sector investment in infrastructure and economic growth,and both exits the causal relationship each other,the private investment is more efficient than state-owned investment,the small elastic cause of state-owned investment and private investment has been analyzed.In order to absorb the private investment,government must reform the investment system and transform government functions and form the multi-investment system by the guide of the government's macroeconomic policies.

7wOhwNL6.title: Research and Practice on the Construction of Innovative Talents Cultivating System
7wOhwNL6.abstract: The practice of Southwest Jiaotong University in constructing innovative talents cultivating system,based on the talents cultivating plan,takes both theoretical and practical teaching as the main channels,and adopts laboratories and teaching base as its platform.The system consists of 4 parts,e.g.theoretical teaching innovative module,students' innovative practice activities module,innovative cultivating base module and policy guarantee module.In the background of popular education,the practice provides valuable experience and mirror for how to establish operable innovative talents cultivating mechanism and constantly improve higher education quality.

8EBtoeKK.title: Development of Chinese Modern Warehousing and Storage: Current Situation and Countermeasures
8EBtoeKK.abstract: Chinese modern warehousing and storage has developed rapidly in recent years and a survey indicates that in 2006 several main indexes of enterprises of warehousing and storage rose by 17%.On the other hand,apparent problems have come into being in such aspects as economic benefit,information management,enterprise's internal management and government's macro-regulation and control.Considering that these problems curb the further development of Chinese modern warehousing and storage,the paper suggests that enterprises and administrative departments should change concepts,introduce new technologies and equipments,and conduct creative management so as to maintain a stable and sustainable development of Chinese modern warehousing and storage.

h0BWkCEn.title: A Study of Undergraduate Education Evaluation Materials and Their Preparation
h0BWkCEn.abstract: Evaluation materials,which are prepared for evaluation experts by the college or university to be evaluated,are a series of files and documents that truly reflect the basic situation of the undergraduate education,including self-evaluation report,supporting materials and reference materials.As the introductory vehicle of the teaching work of the college or university to be evaluated,the quality of evaluation materials can directly influence the experts' evaluation,the final evaluation result and the reputation of the school.As a result,the college or university should study the relevant documents issued by Chinese Ministry of Education,be familiar with the evaluation index system,understand the requirements of each level standard,and conform to principles of preparing evaluation materials such as "three degrees of conformity" and being original,specific and true.

teWJvBAN.title: Pareto Improvement to Return Model in BOT Project
teWJvBAN.abstract: A traditional return model of the BOT project was derived based on the principle-agent theory.Analysis of the mode indicates that the agent(project company) will not chose an action favorable to the principal(government).This is because the traditional contract does not meet the agent's participation constraint.A Pareto improvement was made to the traditional return model,which makes the model meet the agent's participation constraint.In the modified model,the agent will choose an action favorable to the principal,while its own return is not affected.

fKnzanaW.title: Capacity Allocation Optimization of Third Party Warehousing with Demand Updating
fKnzanaW.abstract: Based on the principle of revenue management,capacity scheme and allocation is studied under stochastic demands with early check out and carrying over,in order to maximize third party warehousing revenue.Firstly elementary model is established with problem description,and then robust optimization is used to handle the stochastic variables.Finally,the optimal capacity scheme for each class is determined,so as the capacity allocation policy for each class,by numeric examples.Results show that optimized model can solve demand vibration better,and provide scientific foundation for rational decisions.

uSnbMFqk.title: Revenue Optimization of Capacity Scheme and Allocation of Third Party Warehousing
uSnbMFqk.abstract: Based on the principle of revenue management,capacity scheme and allocation under a stochastic market demand was investigated in order to maximize the revenue of third party warehousing.A stochastic model was established,and robust optimization was used to the stochastic variables so as to turn the stochastic problem into a linear programming one.In addition,the optimal capacity scheme and capacity allocation policy were determined on the basis of numerical examples.The numerical results show that with the help of the model,revenue increases by 2.66%.

oMrIvmi3.title: Innovative Design Platform Based on Knowledge Management and TRIZ
oMrIvmi3.abstract: By creating the space for communication inside the enterprise,the tacit knowledge can be adequately exploit,and with the help of the powerful network system which has been built,the knowledge which is related to the industry that this enterprise belonged to will be searched for intelligently.In this way,the transformation from tacit knowledge to explicit knowledge can be achieved inside the enterprise,meanwhile,the enterprise's knowledge base can be formed.On this basis,by using the knowledge map and enterprise's CAI knowledge-learning software,the explicit knowledge stored in the enterpris's knowledge management platform can be changed into the staff's tacit knowledge.As the result,the power of the enterprise's innovation will be increased.In order to give further support to the innovative design of enterprise,this thesis has designed the framework of the computer-aided innovative platform that based on the knowledge management and TRIZ method,combining both the knowledge management platform that have already been built and the ideas of TRIZ method's problem-solving.

moJcbfrH.title: Study on the Stochastic Programming Model of Ocean ShippingContainer Slot Allocation Problem Based on Revenue Management
moJcbfrH.abstract: Based on revenue management, the container slot allocation problem of ocean shipping industry is studied quantitatively under uncertain circumstances. Firstly, the problem concerned is described facing the trend of ocean shipping industry development and the characteristics of ocean shipping container revenue management. Then, a multi-leg multi-product capacity allocation model is proposed considering empty container transportation. Due to the demand uncertainty, a novel robust optimization method is proposed to solve the model. Finally, we explained the application value of this model and solution method to the container ocean shipping companies by digital simulation.

XXMyrFic.title: Decision Analysis between the Operation Outsourcing Participants in BOT Projects
XXMyrFic.abstract: This paper establishes a game model between the government,the BOT(Build Operate Transfer) project company and the operator under the operation outsourcing.Then,on the condition of operation outsourcing,we analyses the influence that demand sensitiveness of the project product,marginal contribution rate of the operator′s effort to the product′s performance,the product price and the incentive level project company provides for the operator impact on the operation outsourcing model.

GEECIq5E.title: Research on Price Adjustment Mechanism for Infrastructure BOT Projects' Products
GEECIq5E.abstract: Build Operate Transfer(BOT) projects generally have long concession term,various changes of external economy environment will take place in this course.The project companies generally all haven't independent price adjustment right to adapt this kind of changes.Solving this contradiction through designing a restricted price adjustment mechanism,this mechanism allows the project company to carry on price adjustment without exceeding the number of times and range that the government limited.This mechanism also strengthens the project company's adaptive capacity to the economic environment changes and improves its enthusiasm of investing in BOT projects.At the same time,the government also can control the price adjustment's impact on national economic development.

AUvB5rTZ.title: Vehicle routing choice in urban traffic
AUvB5rTZ.abstract: With the occasion of accidence,the stochastic and time-dependent traffic flow causes the uncertainty of travel time in urban traffic, which decides that there only exists dynamic stochastic shortest route.The paper presents a conclusion that vehicle routing choice is context-dependent and varies with traffic importance,time to be used for route,the range of travel time and traveler′s acquaintance to the route,which is different from the existed hypothesis.Based on the empirical study,the paper gives a conclusion that vehicle routing behavior fits for the prospect theory.

XE5UPjq0.title: Flexible choice strategy of fuzzy vehicle routing in urban traffic under uncertainty
XE5UPjq0.abstract: Based on the hypothesis of limited reason, a flexible strategy of dynamic vehicle routing problem with fuzzy travel time was presented through introducing the concept of decision-maker's preference. A model was built for the flexible choice of vehicle routes with a certain departure time, and a heuristic algorithm was proposed. In addition, the influence of the decision-maker's preference on the final objective of the flexible choice was discussed using the method of stochastic simulation. The result indicates that there is the optimal value of P* in a given transportation network under time constraint.

rCUOoU9Y.title: Association between thiopurine S-methyltransferase polymorphisms and thiopurine-induced adverse drug reactions in patients with inflammatory bowel disease: a meta-analysis.
rCUOoU9Y.abstract: Thiopurine drugs are well established treatments in the management of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), but their use is limited by significant adverse drug reactions (ADRs). Thiopurine S-methyltransferase (TPMT) is an important enzyme involved in thiopurine metabolism. Several clinical guidelines recommend determining TPMT genotype or phenotype before initiating thiopurine therapy. Although several studies have investigated the association between TPMT polymorphisms and thiopurine-induced ADRs, the results are inconsistent. The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether there is an association between TPMT polymorphisms and thiopurine-induced ADRs using meta-analysis.We explored PubMed, Web of Science and Embase for articles on TPMT polymorphisms and thiopurine-induced ADRs. Studies that compared TPMT polymorphisms with-ADRs and without-ADRs in IBD patients were included. Relevant outcome data from all the included articles were extracted and the pooled odds ratio (OR) with corresponding 95% confidence intervals were calculated using Revman 5.3 software.Fourteen published studies, with a total of 2,206 IBD patients, which investigated associations between TPMT polymorphisms and thiopurine-induced ADRs were included this meta-analysis. Our meta-analysis demonstrated that TPMT polymorphisms were significantly associated with thiopurine-induced overall ADRs and bone marrow toxicity; pooled ORs were 3.36 (95%CI: 1.82-6.19) and 6.67 (95%CI: 3.88-11.47), respectively. TPMT polymorphisms were not associated with the development of other ADRs including hepatotoxicity, pancreatitis, gastric intolerance, flu-like symptoms and skin reactions; the corresponding pooled ORs were 1.27 (95%CI: 0.60-2.71), 0.97 (95%CI: 0.38-2.48), 1.82 (95%CI: 0.93-3.53), 1.28 (95%CI: 0.47-3.46) and 2.32 (95%CI: 0.86-6.25), respectively.Our meta-analysis demonstrated an association of TPMT polymorphisms with overall thiopurine-induced ADRs and bone marrow toxicity, but not with hepatotoxicity, pancreatitis, flu-like symptoms, gastric intolerance and skin reactions. These findings suggest that pretesting the TPMT genotype could be helpful in clinical practice before initiating thiopurine therapy. However, white blood cell count analysis should be the mainstay for follow-up.

Aby1aO6m.title: Isolation and enrichment of fetal nucleated red blood cells using galactose-specific lectin
Aby1aO6m.abstract: Objectives To construct the reaction system to isolate and enrich fetal nucleated red blood cells(FNRBCs) by using galactose specific lectin.Methods Using the density gradient centrifugation to isolate the needed cells from the cord blood,then grading-up the condition of the reaction system by using laser scanning confocal microscope.Results The glass slid was coated with certain concentration of GalNAc was 50,100,100,150,200μg/mL,and integrate the detected cells with SBA was 20μg/mL,the rate of FNRBCs to nucleus cells was the highest(6.54±0.56)%.Conclusion Galactose-specific lectin can be used to effectively isolate and enrigh FNRBCs.

744DDwBq.title: Rapid detection of pseudomonas aeruginosa with quantum dot based dual-hybirdization technique
744DDwBq.abstract: OBJECTIVE To establish a novel quantum dot-based dual-hybirdization detection technique and apply it for the rapid detection of Pseudomonas aeruginosa.METHODS Hydrosulfide group was adopted to immobilize the 16S rDNA probes of P.aeruginosa on the gold membrane of quartz crystal.We added the target molecular to perform the first hybridization.Then quantum dot-labeled secondary probe were introduced into the detection well after carefully rinse.The total fluorescence intensity was scanned by fluorescence microscopy after the secondary rinse.RESULTS The quantum dot based microorganism biosensor had good signal-noise ratio.The fluorescence intensity was proportioned to the concentration diluted PCR products.A good relationship was evidenced between the fluorescence intensity and PCR products in the period of less than 10000 fold dilution.Specificity experiments had also showed that the P.aeruginosa could be easily differentiated from other homologous bacteria.Methodological experiments had also proved the high sensitivity and specificity(both higher than 90.0%).CONCLUSION This newly constructed quantum dot-based dual-hybirdization detection technique can effectively detect P.aeruginosa,providing a promising method for rapid detection of microorganism.

wVa5pP2h.title: Isolation and enrichment of fetal nucleated red blood cells by using N-acetylgalactosamine-specific lectin
wVa5pP2h.abstract: Objective To isolate and enrich fetal nucleated red blood cells(FNRBCs).Methods Fetal cells were collected by gradient centrifugation from umbilical cord blood collected during delivery,then mixed with soybean agglutinin(SBA) of a serial concentration(10,20,30,40,50 μg/ml) to isolate and enrich FNRBCs by using N-acetylgalactosamine(GalNAc)-coated chamber slides.Results The best working concentration of SBA was 20 μg/ml,which resulted in most effectively isolating and enriching FNRBCs in umbilical cord blood,when the coating concentration of GalNAc was 100 μg/ml.The ratio of white blood cells to nucleated cells were the lowest value(27.7%),and that of FNRBCs to nucleated cells were the highest value(3.7%).Conclusion GalNAc-specific agglutinin could be used to effectively isolate and enrich FNRBCs.

Y9ZvB0Tm.title: Hybridization chain reaction technique based on dissymmetry hairpin probe in detecting pathogenic bacteria: a trail study
Y9ZvB0Tm.abstract: OBJECTIVE To optimize the hybridization chain reaction technique based on dissymmetry hairpin probe to detect the dissymmetry PCR products,and to develop a rapid method to detect the pathogenic bacteria.METHODS The Array Designer 4.0 was used to design dissymmetry hairpin DNA probe for the detection of 16S rDNA variable region of Klebsiella pneumoniae.The probe concentration in hybridization chain reaction system was optimized.The single strand DNA produced by asymmetric PCR acting as an initiator was analyzed by hybridization chain reaction.RESULTS The optimal final hairpin probe concentration was 1 μmol/L in hybridization chain reaction system.Initiator I at concentrations equal to or greater than 0.05 μmol/L could induce the hybridization chain reaction polymers observed via traditional agarose gel electrophoresis.The single strand DNA amplified by asymmetric PCR could also trigger hybridization chain reaction.CONCLUSION The dissymmetry hairpin probe based hybridization chain reaction has such advantages as the reaction system is quite simple and enzyme-free,which can be used for convenient,rapid and specific detection of pathogenic bacteria.

qO9Suol5.title: Multiplex PCR in detection of KPC and NDM producing bacteria
qO9Suol5.abstract: OBJECTIVE To develop a rapid and reliable multiplex PCR-based technique for detection of blaKPC and blaNDM genes in clinical laboratory.METHODS Templates of blaKPC or blaNDM and primers to amplify blaKPC or blaNDM were designed according to Gene Bank.And DNA extracted from KPC-producing Escherichia coli was used as positive to confirm the specificity of multiplex PCR,totally 15 cases of clinically isolated drug resistant bacteria which were suspected to produce KPC and NDM were detected.RESULTS We have successfully developed a rapid and reliable multiplex PCR system for the detection of blaKPC or blaNDM,which can screen out the KPC-producing E.coli;all the 15 clinical isolates were negative.CONCLUSION Multiplex PCR reaction system can detect the KPC or NDM-producing bacteria,which therefore can be applied for the further identification of the clinical suspected bacteria.

k7TQVnJB.title: Human papillomavirus infections and distribution of genotypes in Chongqing
k7TQVnJB.abstract: OBJECTIVE To study the situation of human papillomavirus(HPV) infection and hypotype distribution among women.METHODS A total of 2402 cervical samples collected from women attending cervical screening were tested by nucleic acid hybridization(HC-Ⅱ).RESULTS Total of 720(30.0%) women were HPV positive among the 2402 patients.The high risk hypotype of HPV,for example,HPV16,HPV52 and HPV58 were the main hypotypes among the single HPV hypotype infections.Double HPV hypotype infections was the main hypotype,which account for 17.1% of the total infections,but only one sample was infected simultaneously by six hypotypes of HPV.Among all the age groups,the detection rate of the age group of 26-50 years old was the highest(26.8%).CONCLUSION HPV infection not only has its own characteristics both in the hypotype and year,but also differs apparently from that of other areas.

VrluGgrU.title: Genetic Mutations of HBV Core Region
VrluGgrU.abstract: OBJECTIVE To study the mutation profiles of hepatitis B virus(HBV) in the core regions.METHODS Based on the sequence alignment of all HBV genotypes,specific primers targeting all HBV genotypes were designed to amplify the core region of HBV followed by sequence analysis on the sequencing data available.RESULTS Among the 34 cases,23 cases showed mutations in the core region.According to the mutation profiles,the most common mutations were the A1762T(50.0%) and G1764A(52.9%) in the basic core promoter(BCP) regions,and it always showed as double mutations.The L60V in core gene regions was the secondary common mutations(17.6%).Among all patients,there were 18,6 and 10 cases showed mutations in BCP,pre-core,and core gene regions,respectively.The most common mutations in BCP,pre-core,and core gene regions were the double mutations at A1762T and G1764A(94.7%),G1896A(83.3%),and L60V(50.0%),respectively.CONCLUSIONS The most common mutations in the core region of HBV are the double mutations at A1762T and G1764A.Analysis on the mutation profiles of HBV core regions might be helpful for the prognosis and prediction of HBV infections.

eaxerm2e.title: BRAFV600E mutation and its association with clinicopathological features of colorectal cancer: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
eaxerm2e.abstract: Colorectal cancer (CRC) is a heterogeneous disease with multiple underlying causative genetic mutations. The B-type Raf proto-oncogene (BRAF) plays an important role in the mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK) signaling cascade during CRC. The presence of BRAFV600E mutation can determine the response of a tumor to chemotherapy. However, the association between the BRAFV600E mutation and the clinicopathological features of CRC remains controversial. We performed a systematic review and meta-analysis to estimate the effect of BRAFV600E mutation on the clinicopathological characteristics of CRC.We identified studies that examined the effect of BRAFV600E mutation on CRC within the PubMed, ISI Science Citation Index, and Embase databases. The effect of BRAFV600E on outcome parameters was estimated by odds ratios (ORs) with 95% confidence intervals (CIs) for each study using a fixed effects or random effects model.25 studies with a total of 11,955 CRC patients met inclusion criteria. The rate of BRAFV600 was 10.8% (1288/11955). The BRAFV600E mutation in CRC was associated with advanced TNM stage, poor differentiation, mucinous histology, microsatellite instability (MSI), CpG island methylator phenotype (CIMP). This mutation was also associated with female gender, older age, proximal colon, and mutL homolog 1 (MLH1) methylation.This meta-analysis demonstrated that BRAFV600E mutation was significantly correlated with adverse pathological features of CRC and distinct clinical characteristics. These data suggest that BRAFV600E mutation could be used to supplement standard clinical and pathological staging for the better management of individual CRC patients, and could be considered as a poor prognostic marker for CRC.

Cpw2sDvu.title: Mapping and Analysis of Methylation Status of hMLH1 Promoter in Human Sporadic Colorectal Carcinoma
Cpw2sDvu.abstract: 【Objective】To identify hypermethylation of hMLH1 promoter and to explore its relationship to the expression of hMLH1 and clinicopathologic feature in sporadic colorectal carcinomas. 【Methods】 Methylation status of hMLH1 promoter was measured by bisulfite sequencing. Expression of hMLH1 protein was detected by immunohistochemistry. 【Results】 The hypermethylation of CGIs (CpG islands) 1 was in 20% (6/30) patients. The hMLH1 protein was detected in 50% tumor tissues. 【Conclusion】 There was a highly significant correlation between the hypermethylation of CGIs 1 and loss of hMLH1 expression. Sporadic colorectal cancers with hMLH1 promoter hypermethylation are inclined to occur to tissues have poor differentiation.

rfioh40p.title: Mapping and analysis of the methylation variable positions profiles of hMLH1 promoter CpG islands in human sporadic colorectal carcinoma
rfioh40p.abstract: Objective To map the complete methylation status of the hMLH1 promoter in sporadic colorectal carcinoma and analyze the relationship between MVPs (methylation variable positions) of hMLH1 promoter and the expression of hMLH1. Methods Methylation status of hMLH1 promoter was measured by bisulfite sequencing. hMLH1 protein expression was detected by immunohistochemistry. Results Out of the 30 sporadic colorectal carcinoma specimens, the hypermethylation of CGIs (CpG islands) 1 was in 6 and that of CGIs 2 in 4. The hMLH1 protein was detected in 15 specimens. Chi square test showed the methylation of CGIs 1 was closely related to loss of hMLH1 protein expression (P<0.05) and the methylation of CGIs 2 was not related to loss of hMLH1 protein expression (P>0.05). Conclusion In CGIs 1, CpG positions from 1 to 28 are the critical region that could influence the expression of hMLH1.

uJqkIFDg.title: BRAF mutations in patients with non-small cell lung cancer: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
uJqkIFDg.abstract: BRAF mutations have been well described in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) for several years, but the clinical features of patients harboring BRAF mutations are still not well described. We performed a meta-analysis to identify common clinical features in NSCLC patients carrying BRAF mutations.We identified clinical studies that examined the association between BRAF mutations and features of NSCLC within PubMed, Embase and ISI Science Citation Index database up to October 2013. The effect size of clinical features was estimated by odds ratios (ORs) with 95% confidence interval (CI) for each study, using a fixed-effects or random-effects model.Ten studies with a total of 5599 NSCLC patients were included. There was a 3% (170/5599) BRAF mutation rate. BRAF mutations in NSCLC were significantly associated with adenocarcinomas (ADCs) (compared with non-ADCs, OR = 4.96, 95%CI = 2.29-10.75). There were no significant differences in gender, smoking and stage in patients with and without BRAF mutations. The BRAFV600E mutation was more frequent in women than non-BRAFV600E mutations (OR = 0.27, 95%CI = 0.12-0.59), and was closely related to never smokers (OR = 0.14, 95%CI = 0.05-0.42).These findings have important implications for the prediction of the NSCLC sub-types more accurately combined with other genetic changes.

9JyC0Q3d.title: Detecting Clostridium perfringens Alpha-toxin by Piezoelectric Quartz Crystal Biosensor
9JyC0Q3d.abstract: OBJECTIVE To search a method for identifying Clostridium perfringens alpha-toxin (CPα) by piezoelectric quartz crystal biosensor. METHODS A specific oligonucleotide probe for CPα gene according to the base pairing principle was designed and immobilized on the surface of quartz crystal with thiol self-assembly technique. Then CPα target gene obtained by PCR was detected by using the piezoelectric quartz crystal biosensor with mass effect. And the influence of different pH values and different ionic strength for detection were explored. RESULTS CPα was successfully detected by the piezoelectric quartz crystal biosensor. And the optimal conditions for detecting CPα were pH7.6 and 0.64mol/L NaCl solution. CONCLUSIONS The CPα could be detected efficiently by piezoelectric quartz crystal biosensor. Such method can provide a new modality for toxin diagnosis in clinic.

8BiZfDFC.title: Optimization of DNA probe and quantum dot concentration on Pseudomonas aeruginosa
8BiZfDFC.abstract: OBJECTIVE To optimize the condition that DNA probe conjugates with quantum dots in marking 16s rDNA of Pseudomonas aeruginosa and to establish a novel quantum dot-based detection technique for rapid detection of P.aeruginosa.METHODS Hydrosulfide group was adopted to immobilize the 16S rDNA probes of P.aeruginosa on the gold membrane of quartz crystal.We added the target molecular to perform the first hybridization.Then quantum dot-labeled secondary probe was introduced into the detection well after carefully rinse.The total fluorescence intensity was scanned by fluorescence microscopy after the secondary rinse.RESULTS Different DNA∶QD ratio could provide different DNA conjugation efficiency,which played an important role in the later fluorescence intensity detection.We found the increased DNA∶QD ratio could significantly enhance the detectable fluorescence signals;when the ratio reached 100∶1,the fluorescence intensity did not increase any longer,indicating that this concentration was the optimized conjugation concentration.CONCLUSION We have successfully optimized the DNA∶QD ratio and constructed a quantum dot-based detection technique that can effectively detect P.aeruginosa,providing a promising method for rapid detection of microorganism in clinics.

Be1sshzZ.title: Control of nosocomial infections in microbiology laboratory of clinical laboratory department
Be1sshzZ.abstract: OBJECTIVE To understand the condition of microorganism contamination in clinical laboratory and prevent nosocomial infections so as to provide reasonable suggestion for the prevention of nosocomial infections in microbiology laboratory.METHODS The links that were prone to nosocomial infections were investigated through analyzing the biosafety of microbiological laboratory,the medical personnel′s safety,and the safety of the laboratory report delivery.RESULTS The nosocomial infections in the microbiological laboratory have been effectively controlled through the strict implementation of operation procedure,reasonable disposal of medical waste and the standard delivery of the laboratory report.CONCLUSION The keys to prevent the nosocomial infections in microbiology laboratory are to perfect the regulation system and to strengthen the training of the knowledge of nosocomial infections as well as the self-protection of the medical personnel.

YqYnrOd6.title: Enhanced specificity of TPMT*2 genotyping using unidirectional wild-type and mutant allele-specific scorpion primers in a single tube.
YqYnrOd6.abstract: Genotyping of thiopurine S-methyltransferase (TPMT) is recommended for predicting the adverse drug response of thiopurines. In the current study, a novel version of allele-specific PCR (AS-PCR), termed competitive real-time fluorescent AS-PCR (CRAS-PCR) was developed to analyze the TPMT*2 genotype in ethnic Chinese. This technique simultaneously uses wild-type and mutant allele-specific scorpion primers in a single reaction. To determine the optimal conditions for both traditional AS-PCR and CRAS-PCR, we used the Taguchi method, an engineering optimization process that balances the concentrations of all components using an orthogonal array rather than a factorial array. Instead of running up to 264 experiments with the conventional factorial method, the Taguchi method achieved the same optimization using only 16 experiments. The optimized CRAS-PCR system completely avoided non-specific amplification occurring in traditional AS-PCR and could be performed at much more relaxed reaction conditions at 1% sensitivity, similar to traditional AS-PCR. TPMT*2 genotyping of 240 clinical samples was consistent with published data. In conclusion, CRAS-PCR is a novel and robust genotyping method, and the Taguchi method is an effective tool for the optimization of molecular analysis techniques.

iHflZvII.title: DNA Staining Efficiencies of Different Fluorescent Dyes in Preparative Agarose Gel Electrophoresis:A Comparative Analysis
iHflZvII.abstract: OBJECTIVE To set-up safe alternatives to ethidium bromide(EB).METHODS Comparative analysis was performed on the DNA staining efficiencies of 4 fluorescent dyes including SYBR Gold,SYBR Green Ⅰ,(GoldView) and EB in preparative agarose gel electrophoresis.RESULTS Although both SYBR Gold and SYBR Green Ⅰ altered electrophoretic mobility and thus DNA size estimates,they were cost-effective alternatives to EB.SYBR Gold was more sensitive than SYBR Green Ⅰ at detecting short fragments,but 50 bp bands were clearly(visible) using either dye when visualized with a long integration time.CONCLUSIONS SYBR Gold or SYBR Green Ⅰ are sensitive and relatively safe alternatives to EB.

1DmjI3E2.title: Optimization of Conditions of Homologous Gene Quantitative Polymerase Chain Reaction
1DmjI3E2.abstract: OBJECTIVE To evaluate the standard of non-invasive diagnosis of Down′s syndrome between the different PCR machines. METHODS Two kinds of PCR machines were used respectively to amplify the homologous genes-the human liver-like phosphofructokinase gene (PFKL) and the human muscle-like phosphofructokinase gene (PFKM). RESULTS The best annealing temperature of the two PCR machines were 64 ℃ and 60 ℃,and only in this reaction conditions PFKL′s and PFKM′s electrophoresis strips had the same optical density value. CONCLUSIONS This approach has proven that the conditions of amplified the PFKL and PFKM are different between the two kinds of PCR machines.
keywords: Homologous gene quantitative polymerase chain reaction

ARmTJVlB.title: Isothermal and rapid detection of pathogenic microorganisms using a nano-rolling circle amplification-surface plasmon resonance biosensor.
ARmTJVlB.abstract: Rolling circle amplification (RCA) of DNA is a sensitive and cost effective method for the rapid identification of pathogens without the need for sequencing. In this study, a surface plasmon resonance DNA biosensor based on RCA with a gold (Au) nanoparticle surface was established for isothermal identification of DNA. The probes included a specific padlock probe, a capture probe (CP), which is bound to biotin, and an Au nanoparticle-modified probe, which hybridizes with the RCA products. The CP was assembled on gold nanoparticles to increase its ability to bind and hybridize. The linear padlock probe, which was designed to circularize by ligation upon recognition of the bacterial pathogen-specific sequence in 16S rDNA, hybridizes to fully complementary sequences within the CP. Upon recognition, each target gene DNA is distinguished by localization onto the corresponding channel on the chip surface. Then, the immobilized CPs act as primers to begin the in situ solid-phase RCA reaction, which produces long single-stranded DNA. The RCA products fixed on the chip surface cause significant surface plasmon resonance angle changes. We demonstrated that six different bacterial pathogens can be identified simultaneously and that 0.5 pM of synthetic oligonucleotides and 0.5 pg μl(-1) of genomic DNA from clinical samples can be detected by this method with low background signals. Therefore, the multiplex diagnostic method provides a highly sensitive and specific approach for the rapid identification of positive samples.
